name: happn-db-provider-mongo
description: service plugin for running happn on a mongo database, for happn-3 instances

scripts.test: npm run lint && mocha silence.js test/integration/**
scripts.test-cover: npm run lint && nyc  --reporter=lcov --reporter=text-summary _mocha --exit silence.js test/integration/** test/unit/**
scripts.release: rm -rf node_modules && rm -f package-lock.json && npm install && npm test
